name: Falafel
body:
## Falafel
Falafel is a Facebook client for the terminal developed by K-Dog (Kevin Chavez) and Swayjay (Ajay Gandhi) at Big Red Hacks 2014. Simply put, Falafel is unproductively for the 1337.

### How do I do?
First, make sure you have Node.js. Then:
```
$ npm install -g fb-falafel
$ npm link
```

### Usage
To use Falafel, just type in facebook:
```
$ facebook
```

Use the `--help` parameter to get a list of options for facebook.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
